verses.verse: And <WG2532> as Jesus passed by <WG3855>, he saw <WG1492> a man <WG444> which was blind <WG5185> from <WG1537> his birth <WG1079>.

And <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101> asked <WG2065> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Master <WG4461>, who <WG5101> did sin <WG264>, this man <WG3778>, or <WG2228> his <WG846> parents <WG1118>, that <WG2443> he was born <WG1080> blind <WG5185>?

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611>, Neither <WG3777> hath <WG264> this man <WG3778> sinned <WG264>, nor <WG3777> his <WG846> parents <WG1118>: but <WG235> that <WG2443> the works <WG2041> of God <WG2316> should be made manifest <WG5319> in <WG1722> him <WG846>.

I <WG1691> must <WG1163> work <WG2038> the works <WG2041> of him that sent <WG3992> me <WG3165>, while <WG2193> it is <WG2076> day <WG2250>: the night <WG3571> cometh <WG2064>, when <WG3753> no man <WG3762> can <WG1410> work <WG2038>.
As long as <WG3752> I am <WG5600> in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>, I am <WG1510> the light <WG5457> of the world <WG2889>.

When he had thus <WG5023> spoken <WG2036>, he spat <WG4429> on the ground <WG5476>, and <WG2532> made <WG4160> clay <WG4081> of <WG1537> the spittle <WG4427>, and <WG2532> he anointed <WG2025> <WG1909> the eyes <WG3788> of the blind man <WG5185> with the clay <WG4081>, anointed: or, spread the clay upon the eyes of the blind man

And <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Go <WG5217>, wash <WG3538> in <WG1519> the pool <WG2861> of Siloam <WG4611>, (which <WG3739> is by interpretation <WG2059>, Sent <WG649>.) He went his way <WG565> therefore <WG3767>, and <WG2532> washed <WG3538>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> seeing <WG991>.

The neighbours <WG1069> therefore <WG3767>, and <WG2532> they which before <WG4386> had seen <WG2334> him <WG846> that <WG3754> he was <WG2258> blind <WG5185>, said <WG3004>, Is <WG2076> not <WG3756> this <WG3778> he that sat <WG2521> and <WG2532> begged <WG4319>?

Some <WG243> said <WG3004>, <WG3754> This <WG3778> is he <WG2076>: <WG1161> others <WG243> said, <WG3754> He is <WG2076> like <WG3664> him <WG846>: but he <WG1565> said <WG3004>, <WG3754> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> he.
Therefore <WG3767> said they <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, How <WG4459> were <WG455> thine <WG4675> eyes <WG3788> opened <WG455>?

He <WG1565> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, A man <WG444> that is called <WG3004> Jesus <WG2424> made <WG4160> clay <WG4081>, and <WG2532> anointed <WG2025> mine <WG3450> eyes <WG3788>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto me <WG3427>, Go <WG5217> to <WG1519> the pool <WG2861> of Siloam <WG4611>, and <WG2532> wash <WG3538>: and <WG1161> I went <WG565> and <WG2532> washed <WG3538>, and I received sight <WG308>.
Then <WG3767> said they <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Where <WG4226> is <WG2076> he <WG1565>? He said <WG3004>, I know <WG1492> not <WG3756>.
They brought <WG71> to <WG4314> the Pharisees <WG5330> him <WG846> that aforetime <WG4218> was blind <WG5185>.
And <WG1161> it was <WG2258> the sabbath day <WG4521> when <WG3753> Jesus <WG2424> made <WG4160> the clay <WG4081>, and <WG2532> opened <WG455> his <WG846> eyes <WG3788>.

Then <WG3767> again <WG3825> the Pharisees <WG5330> also <WG2532> asked <WG2065> him <WG846> how <WG4459> he had received his sight <WG308>. <WG1161> He said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, He put <WG2007> clay <WG4081> upon <WG1909> mine <WG3450> eyes <WG3788>, and <WG2532> I washed <WG3538>, and <WG2532> do see <WG991>.

Therefore <WG3767> said <WG3004> some <WG5100> of <WG1537> the Pharisees <WG5330>, This <WG3778> man <WG444> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> of <WG3844> God <WG2316>, because <WG3754> he keepeth <WG5083> not <WG3756> the sabbath day <WG4521>. Others <WG243> said <WG3004>, How <WG4459> can <WG1410> a man <WG444> that is a sinner <WG268> do <WG4160> such <WG5108> miracles <WG4592>? And <WG2532> there was <WG2258> a division <WG4978> among <WG1722> them <WG846>.

They say <WG3004> unto the blind man <WG5185> again <WG3825>, What <WG5101> sayest <WG3004> thou <WG4771> of <WG4012> him <WG846>, that <WG3754> he hath opened <WG455> thine <WG4675> eyes <WG3788>? He said <WG2036>, <WG3754> <WG1161> He is <WG2076> a prophet <WG4396>.

But <WG3767> the Jews <WG2453> did <WG4100> not <WG3756> believe <WG4100> concerning <WG4012> him <WG846>, that <WG3754> he had been <WG2258> blind <WG5185>, and <WG2532> received his sight <WG308>, until <WG2193> <WG3755> they called <WG5455> the parents <WG1118> of him <WG846> that had received his sight <WG308>.

And <WG2532> they asked <WG2065> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, Is <WG2076> this <WG3778> your <WG5216> son <WG5207>, who <WG3739> ye <WG5210> say <WG3004> <WG3754> was born <WG1080> blind <WG5185>? how <WG4459> then <WG3767> doth he <WG991> now <WG737> see <WG991>?

His <WG846> parents <WG1118> answered <WG611> them <WG846> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, We know <WG1492> that <WG3754> this <WG3778> is <WG2076> our <WG2257> son <WG5207>, and <WG2532> that <WG3754> he was born <WG1080> blind <WG5185>:

But <WG1161> by what means <WG4459> he <WG991> now <WG3568> seeth <WG991>, we know <WG1492> not <WG3756>; or <WG2228> who <WG5101> hath opened <WG455> his <WG846> eyes <WG3788>, we <WG2249> know <WG1492> not <WG3756>: he <WG846> is <WG2192> of age <WG2244>; ask <WG2065> him <WG846>: he <WG846> shall speak <WG2980> for <WG4012> himself <WG848>.

These <WG5023> words spake <WG2036> his <WG846> parents <WG1118>, because <WG3754> they feared <WG5399> the Jews <WG2453>: for <WG1063> the Jews <WG2453> had agreed <WG4934> already <WG2235>, that <WG2443> if <WG1437> any man <WG5100> did confess <WG3670> that he <WG846> was Christ <WG5547>, he should be <WG1096> put out of the synagogue <WG656>.
Therefore <WG1223> <WG5124> said <WG2036> his <WG846> parents <WG1118>, <WG3754> He is <WG2192> of age <WG2244>; ask <WG2065> him <WG846>.

Then <WG3767> again <WG1208> <WG1537> called they <WG5455> the man <WG444> that <WG3739> was <WG2258> blind <WG5185>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Give <WG1325> God <WG2316> the praise <WG1391>: we <WG2249> know <WG1492> that <WG3754> this <WG3778> man <WG444> is <WG2076> a sinner <WG268>.

<WG3767> He <WG1565> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, Whether <WG1487> he be <WG2076> a sinner <WG268> or no, I know <WG1492> not <WG3756>: one thing <WG1520> I know <WG1492>, that <WG3754>, whereas I was <WG5607> blind <WG5185>, now <WG737> I see <WG991>.
Then <WG1161> said they <WG2036> to him <WG846> again <WG3825>, What <WG5101> did he <WG4160> to thee <WG4671>? how <WG4459> opened he <WG455> thine <WG4675> eyes <WG3788>?

He answered <WG611> them <WG846>, I have told <WG2036> you <WG5213> already <WG2235>, and <WG2532> ye did <WG191> not <WG3756> hear <WG191>: wherefore <WG5101> would <WG2309> ye hear <WG191> it again <WG3825>? will <WG3361> <WG2309> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> be <WG1096> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>?

Then <WG3767> they reviled <WG3058> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, Thou <WG4771> art <WG1488> his <WG1565> disciple <WG3101>; but <WG1161> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> Moses' <WG3475> disciples <WG3101>.
We <WG2249> know <WG1492> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> spake <WG2980> unto Moses <WG3475>: as for this <WG1161> <WG5126> fellow, we know <WG1492> not <WG3756> from whence <WG4159> he is <WG2076>.

The man <WG444> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG1063> herein <WG1722> <WG5129> is <WG2076> a marvellous thing <WG2298>, that <WG3754> ye <WG5210> know <WG1492> not <WG3756> from whence <WG4159> he is <WG2076>, and <WG2532> yet he hath opened <WG455> mine <WG3450> eyes <WG3788>.

Now <WG1161> we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> heareth <WG191> not <WG3756> sinners <WG268>: but <WG235> if <WG1437> any man <WG5100> be <WG5600> a worshipper of God <WG2318>, and <WG2532> doeth <WG4160> his <WG846> will <WG2307>, him <WG5127> he heareth <WG191>.
Since <WG1537> the world began <WG165> was it <WG191> not <WG3756> heard <WG191> that <WG3754> any man <WG5100> opened <WG455> the eyes <WG3788> of one that was born <WG1080> blind <WG5185>.
If <WG1508> this man <WG3778> were <WG2258> not <WG1508> of <WG3844> God <WG2316>, he could <WG1410> <WG3756> do <WG4160> nothing <WG3762>.

They answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Thou <WG4771> wast <WG1080> altogether <WG3650> born <WG1080> in <WG1722> sins <WG266>, and <WG2532> dost thou <WG4771> teach <WG1321> us <WG2248>? And <WG2532> they cast <WG1544> him <WG846> out <WG1854>. cast: or, excommunicated him

Jesus <WG2424> heard <WG191> that <WG3754> they had cast <WG1544> him <WG846> out <WG1854>; and <WG2532> when he had found <WG2147> him <WG846>, he said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Dost <WG4100> thou <WG4771> believe <WG4100> on <WG1519> the Son <WG5207> of God <WG2316>?
He <WG1565> answered <WG611> and <WG2532> said <WG2036>, Who <WG5101> is he <WG2076>, Lord <WG2962>, that <WG2443> I might believe <WG4100> on <WG1519> him <WG846>?

And <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Thou hast <WG3708> both <WG2532> seen <WG3708> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> it is <WG2076> he <WG1565> that talketh <WG2980> with <WG3326> thee <WG4675>.
And <WG1161> he said <WG5346>, Lord <WG2962>, I believe <WG4100>. And <WG2532> he worshipped <WG4352> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036>, For <WG1519> judgment <WG2917> I <WG1473> am come <WG2064> into <WG1519> this <WG5126> world <WG2889>, that <WG2443> they which see <WG991> not <WG3361> might see <WG991>; and <WG2532> that they which see <WG991> might be made <WG1096> blind <WG5185>.

And <WG2532> some of <WG1537> the Pharisees <WG5330> which <WG3588> were <WG5607> with <WG3326> him <WG846> heard <WG191> these words <WG5023>, and <WG2532> said <WG2036> unto him <WG846>, Are <WG3361> <WG2070> we <WG2249> blind <WG5185> also <WG2532>?

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto them <WG846>, If <WG1487> ye were <WG2258> blind <WG5185>, ye should <WG302> have <WG2192> no <WG3756> sin <WG266>: but <WG1161> now <WG3568> ye say <WG3004>, <WG3754> We see <WG991>; therefore <WG3767> your <WG5216> sin <WG266> remaineth <WG3306>.
